org.spongepowered.api.text

Class TextBuilder.Literal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.text.TextBuilder
      • org.spongepowered.api.text.TextBuilder.Literal
  • Enclosing class:
    TextBuilder

    public static class TextBuilder.Literal
extends TextBuilder
    Represents a TextBuilder creating immutable Text.Literal instances.
    See Also:
    Text.Literal
